name: The Forest Calls
description:
A downloadable game for Windows and macOS

The Forest Calls to you. Will you heed it?

A short, proof of concept piece that is meant for a much larger future game (hopefully).  In this interactive fiction piece, you are asked strange questions by a strange presence, who in the end will reveal what spirit will answer to you. 

The fully realized game would be a 3rd person RPG, management game where you must protect and watch over the forest and its inhabitants as the spiritual guardian of the woods. 

This proof of concept was made entirely inside the computer programming language Processing.
